genresAdvancedInfo.name: viola caipira
genresAdvancedInfo.description: Viola caipira is a traditional Brazilian music genre that features the 10-stringed viola, often played in a fingerpicking style. It has a rustic and melancholic sound that reflects the rural life of Brazil's countryside. The lyrics often tell stories of love, nature, and the struggles of the working class. Viola caipira is an important part of Brazil's cultural heritage and has gained popularity in recent years.
